hasDitaContent.@value: Aceclofenac potentially increases the risk of seizures when given with levofloxacin. Manufacturer advises caution.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Aceclofenac   potentially   increases   the risk of seizures when given with   levofloxacin .  Manufacturer advises caution .

hasDitaContent.@value: Levofloxacin increases the anticoagulant effect of acenocoumarol. Manufacturer advises monitor INR.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Levofloxacin   increases   the anticoagulant effect of   acenocoumarol .  Manufacturer advises monitor INR .

hasDitaContent.@value: Aluminium hydroxide decreases the absorption of levofloxacin. Manufacturer advises levofloxacin should be taken 2 hours before or 4 hours after aluminium hydroxide.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Aluminium hydroxide   decreases   the absorption of   levofloxacin .  Manufacturer advises  levofloxacin  should be taken 2 hours before or 4 hours after  aluminium hydroxide .

hasDitaContent.@value: Didanosine (buffered) is predicted to greatly decrease the exposure to oral levofloxacin. Manufacturer advises didanosine should be taken 2 hours after quinolones.
